item.title: Just Finished HackMIT
item.description: We won the NASDAQ challenge for compensating for audio delay in livestreamed music. The motivation behind this project was to coordinate music-related events during COVID social distancing. Think bands or acapella groups (shoutout to joyful noise). We can now put our picture on the NASDAQ New York Billboard. Kinda weird to see my face in New York. Eddie says he will go take a picture of it (he lives in NJ).
